name: smacss-sass-pattern
description: SASS folder structure, based on SMACSS methodology and 7-1 pattern with npm package sass and postCss

scripts.watch: sass --source-map sass/main.scss:style.css -w --style compressed ; postcss style.css --use autoprefixer -d style.css
scripts.build:styles: npm run build:sass && npm run build:prefixes

author: Rad Skotnicki
